sentences: Anastasia Platonovna Zuyeva (Russian: Анастаси́я Плато́новна Зу́ева; 1896 —  1986) was a Soviet Russian film and stage actress.
Winner of the Stalin Prize of the second degree (1952).
1940 —  Fifth Ocean as Darina Egorovna, Natasha's mother
1941 —  Battle Movie Collection No.6 as Praskovya
1955 —  Vasyok Trubachyov and His Comrades as Aunt Dunya
1958 —  A Groom from the Other World as Anna Mikhaylovna
Russian Souvenir as Egorkina, wife of Siberian hunter
There Is Such a Lad as Marfa
1968 —  Fire, Water, and Brass Pipes as narrator
Barbara the Fair with the Silken Hair as narrator
Married Elderly Couple as Avdotya Nikitichna
Day by Day as old nurse
1978 —  Again Aniskin as Lizaveta Grigorievna Tolstykh
1982 —  Along Unknown Paths as Glafira Andreyevna, grandmother
